name: Turboroko Gaiden: Cyclic Synthesis
description:
ENTER THE «SURROGATE EXPERIMENT».

Welcome to Turboroko Gaiden, a side story in marsye0's Turboroko series.

Created in Twine Harlowe 2.1.0 for a class project, this is a short text adventure about a gods-blessed hardboiled detective who manipulates time to escape a strange experiment conducted by the mysterious «Picross». But going back in time has permanent, deadly consequences...

A serial kidnapper has brought four individuals into an experiment that will test their wits and unlock their potential... but to what end?

Control a mannequin named «Neinstar» as you solve puzzle rooms and learn the truth about her strange ability. Your teammates are your extra lives in this time-warping puzzler.

  • Death is only the beginning: includes 4.5 different endings depending on the surviving cast
  • Mysterious journey: Run through puzzle rooms and discover new side lore of the Turboroko universe
  • A tense adventure: Learn the mysteries of the «surrogates» and save your party from certain doom

WILL YOU DESTROY THE MAGNUM OPUS?

Word count approx. 17,410.

TurborokoTurboroko titles at https://marsye0.itch.io/)
